availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Campbell County, Kentucky, resident. Native of Saxony. Married to Christina Ghoepp Viehmann. Father of Henry Viehmann, Conrad Viehmann, Christie Viehmann, and John Viehmann. Resident of Campbell County, Kentucky, in 1862. Convinced of selling liquor to minors in Campbell County in 1862.

ab.bibl:
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Campbell County, Newport, p. 391A.
Kentucky Death Certificates, 1911-1965, Kentucky Office of Vital Statistics, KDLA, Frankfort, KY, File #21404.
Kentucky, Wills and Probate Records, 1774-1989, Kentucky County, District, and Probate Courts, Campbell County Wills, vol. 1-2, 1863-1887, p. 532.
KYR-0001-029-0091.
